Since the project itself is a blog, I don’t feel that I need to do too extensive of a write-up on it. However, I think it should be said that this is one of my favorite projects I’ve ever completed. Im Ausland gave me the opportunity to combine my love of technology, travel, and a deep interest in writing (which I’m working on…) all in to one project.

After I completed the project I also created a how-to thingamajig to show other people how to do what I did…this really solidifies my lack of need to do a write-up. So yeah, cool project. Lots of fun. Go travel.
